a sorted array C by merging A and B 
0 2 3 3 3 4 5 8 11 11 11 12 12 14 14 16 17 17 18 18 19 19 21 21 22 23 24 26 27 27 28 31 32 33 34 35 36 38 41 41 41 41 42 42 44 45 45 45 47 49 
a sorted array C for A ∪ B
0 2 3 4 5 8 11 12 14 16 17 18 19 21 22 23 24 26 27 28 31 32 33 34 35 36 38 41 42 44 45 47 49 
a sorted array C for A ∩ B
11 12 14 17 19 41 42 45
